title: Thoma Bravo Announces Key Appointments to Grow Private Credit Platform - PR Newswire
summary:
Levin was a founding member of Morgan Stanley Investment Management's Private Credit business and was most recently Co-Head of its North America Private Credit platform.
These appointments reflect our commitment to building a leading, scaled private credit platform positioned to capture attractive opportunities across market cycles."
"I'm excited to join Thoma Bravo Credit at such a dynamic time for private credit," said Kunal Soni.
About Thoma Bravo Thoma Bravo is one of the largest software-focused investors in the world, with approximately $181 billion in assets under management as of June 30, 2025.
Contacts Thoma Bravo Megan Frank +1.212.731.4778 [email protected] or FGS Global Akash Lodh [email protected] SOURCE Thoma Bravo

title: AlphaPoint Announces POLYX & Polymesh Native Assets Live on Its Platform for Exchanges and RWA Tokenization - Morningstar
summary:
Polymesh Native Asset Integration: Native tokens built on Polymesh, including security tokens and RWA tokens, can now be minted, issued, traded, and settled through AlphaPoint's APEX white-label exchange and APAD (Asset Digitization) infrastructure.
With POLYX and Polymesh native assets now live, AlphaPoint enables end-to-end functionality for institutions to transact using POLYX as well as native Polymesh security tokens and RWA tokens.
"Activating POLYX and Polymesh native assets on AlphaPoint is a natural step as this market grows with Polymesh natively supporting issuer requirements."
Availability POLYX and Polymesh native asset functionality are available immediately to new and existing AlphaPoint clients.
About Polymesh / POLYX Polymesh is an institutional-grade public permissioned blockchain built specifically for regulated assets.
